last_episode_to_air.name: Stone Survivor
last_episode_to_air.overview: Steve shows off some Stone Cold versatility. First, he displays his survival skills as he heads into a forest during a blizzard. Then he effortlessly becomes a Las Vegas tour guide and needs just a quick lesson in drag strip racing before he puts himself to the test against tough competition. Finally, he looks back at the stunning array of adventures he's had during this thrilling season.

name: Stone Cold Takes on America
overview: For over two decades, “Stone Cold” Steve Austin gave everything to wrestling, becoming one of the all-time greats. However, his dedication to his career meant sacrificing many of the other experiences life has to offer. In “Stone Cold Takes on America,” Austin hits the road in his RV, accepting challenges from fans that push him out of his comfort zone, and make up for lost time. Through archival footage from classic WWE moments and his own stories, the series weaves together Austin’s old and new life—both filled with incredible feats and his unique point of view—as he celebrates and learns from new experiences how only “Stone Cold” Steve Austin can.

episodes.name: Conquering Sand Mountain
episodes.overview: "Stone Cold" Steve Austin hits the road on an RV journey through adventures he never had time for as a wrestling superstar, including bowling with seniors, riding the rim of a 600-foot high mountain of sand, and learning the art of cocktail creation.

episodes.name: The Fast Food and the Furious
episodes.overview: Steve jumps into action at the drive-thru window of a fast-food restaurant, RVs over to an ax-throwing spot to master a new sport, and learns the fast and furious ways of formula drifting; Steve learns a trick from a legendary Las Vegas mentalist.

episodes.name: Wedding Crusher
episodes.overview: In this episode, Steve Austin experiences a new kind of stage combat with Cirque du Soleil, learns the gourmet way to cook game meats and performs the first ever Stone Cold wedding ceremony.

episodes.name: Stone Cold Front
episodes.overview: Steve takes on the challenge of nailing the morning weather report at a local TV station. Then, Steve sees if he still has his skills as a master driving instructor, teaching road skills to a trio of teens and a very unpredictable New Zealander. Finally, Steve and his buddies head to a famed fishing lake to see who can catch more of the legendary Lahontan Cutthroat Trout.

episodes.name: Off Road Trippin
episodes.overview: Steve will dive headlong into his first official offroad buggy race, join a local sheriff’s department in the pursuit of justice and then learn the art of serving haute cuisine at a steak house. But first, “Stone Cold” will grill his crew with the help of a lie detector operator to solve The Case of the Missing Beer!!

episodes.name: Catch Steve If You Can
episodes.overview: The wrestler becomes the hunted as Steve tries to elude a world-famous human tracker. The big man then gets small as he takes on the runts of the racetrack in a high-speed kart race. The competition keeps going as "Stone Cold" becomes the quizmaster at a raucous local bar trivia night. Things finally calm down when Steve spends a quiet desert night getting a closer look at planets and stars with some passionate amateur astronomers.

episodes.name: School of Rock Crawling
episodes.overview: Stone Cold is on the move as Steve takes on four wildly different forms of transportation; he learns the art of mushing with Iditarod-level dog-sled racers; he moves on to extreme rock crawling and takes his first lesson as a helicopter pilot.

episodes.name: Raging Bullseye
episodes.overview: Dog-lover Steve gets a treat when he learns the secrets of sheep-herding dogs; Stone Cold is also a pretty good amateur archer but will get the true test of his skills in taking on Olympic-level shooters.

episodes.name: Stone Survivor
episodes.overview: Steve shows off some Stone Cold versatility. First, he displays his survival skills as he heads into a forest during a blizzard. Then he effortlessly becomes a Las Vegas tour guide and needs just a quick lesson in drag strip racing before he puts himself to the test against tough competition. Finally, he looks back at the stunning array of adventures he's had during this thrilling season.
